title: Recent progress in solar-driven CO2 reduction to multicarbon products
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00186A, Tutorial Review
Mengqian Li, Zequn Han, Qinyuan Hu, Wenya Fan, Qing Hu, Dongpo He, QingXia Chen, Xingchen Jiao, Yi Xie
Metal oxides, metal sulfides, MXenes, and metalâ€“organic frameworks act as catalysts, while covalent organic frameworks, carbon nitrides, metal phosphides, and graphene oxides serve as cocatalysts for CO2 photoreduction to multicarbon products.
